extracted_playbook.title: Apply Available Patches for CVE-2023-42793
extracted_playbook.description: Apply available patches for CVE-2023-42793 issued by JetBrains TeamCity in mid-September 2023, if not already completed.

extracted_playbook.title: Monitor Network for Encoded Commands and Network Scanning Tools
extracted_playbook.description: Monitor the network for evidence of encoded commands and execution of network scanning tools.

extracted_playbook.title: Enable Host-Based Anti-Virus/Endpoint Monitoring Solutions
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure host-based anti-virus/endpoint monitoring solutions are enabled and set to alert if monitoring or reporting is disabled, or if communication is lost with a host agent for more than a reasonable amount of time.

extracted_playbook.title: Require Use of Multi-Factor Authentication
extracted_playbook.description: Require use of multi-factor authentication for all services to the extent possible, particularly for email, virtual private networks, and accounts that access critical systems.

extracted_playbook.title: Keep Systems Updated
extracted_playbook.description: Keep all operating systems, software, and firmware up to date.

extracted_playbook.title: Configure Newly-Added Systems
extracted_playbook.description: Immediately configure newly-added systems to the network, including those used for testing or development work, to follow the organizationâ€™s security baseline and incorporate into enterprise monitoring tools.

extracted_playbook.title: Audit Log Files
extracted_playbook.description: Audit log files to identify attempts to access privileged certificates and creation of fake identity providers.

extracted_playbook.title: Deploy Software to Identify Suspicious Behavior
extracted_playbook.description: Deploy software to identify suspicious behavior on systems.

extracted_playbook.title: Deploy Endpoint Protection Systems
extracted_playbook.description: Deploy endpoint protection systems with the ability to monitor for behavioral indicators of compromise.

extracted_playbook.title: Configure Authentication Mechanisms
extracted_playbook.description: Configure authentication mechanisms to confirm certain user activities on systems, including registering new devices.
